member.summary: Specifies the column to be sorted

member.name: F:ACWin.clsListViewColumnSorter.OrderOfSort
member.summary: Specifies the order in which to sort (i.e. 'Ascending').

member.name: M:ACWin.clsListViewColumnSorter.Compare(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: This method is inherited from the IComparer interface. It compares the two objects passed using a case insensitive comparison.
member.returns: The result of the comparison. "0" if equal, negative if 'x' is less than 'y' and positive if 'x' is greater than 'y'

member.name: P:ACWin.clsListViewColumnSorter.SortColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of the column to which to apply the sorting operation (Defaults to '0').

member.name: P:ACWin.clsListViewColumnSorter.Order
member.summary: Gets or sets the order of sorting to apply (for example, 'Ascending' or 'Descending').

member.name: T:ACWin.clsListViewColumnSorter
member.summary: This class is an implementation of the 'IComparer' interface.
